author: bharath.vedartham
content:
I was thinking about this. In `process_pending_deposits` a deposit is only considered if `deposit.slot > finalized_slot` 
So a builder could create the deposit after epoch N-2 where epoch N is `GLOAS_FORK_EPOCH` to have 0 risk of their deposit being applied as a validator deposit

author: bharath.vedartham
content: 2 epochs which is around 13mins seems like a good enough time to get your deposits included on chain so that it is considered at the hard fork boundary

author: jtraglia
content: Yes, as long as the pending deposit queue is long enough. I would probably suggest N-3 or N-4 at the latest though, just for peace of mind.
